data.actual_result: The login screen is using the light theme
data.expected_result: The login screen should be using the dark theme
data.short_description: Light theme login screen when logging out of your account on dark theme
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to User Settings > Appearance and make sure that your client is set to the dark theme - Press the Log Out button located in the top right corner of the display - Notice that the login screen is light instead of dark
